Name: Magician
Last Words 1: Oh no! I was aiming for 'magic'[;] but this outcome is|closer to 'tragic'.
Last Words 2: Pfft[;] typical.||I spend all day stuffing roses and rabbits up my sleeves|and then I lose before I even get to use them.
Last Words Endgame: Honestly given that you've already beaten the whole|dungeons[;] it'd be polite for you to lose a few more|fights here and there. Still[;] you do you I guess.

Name: Space Marine
Last Words 1: Zooooom! Boooom! That was spectacular!||Hey[;] if you make it out of here[;] say hello|to the moon for me.||I still think about it every day...
Last Words 2: Bazaaaam[;] you're a star!||Ah[;] I loved the stars.
Last Words Endgame: BAAAAM! I'm so proud of you!||I mean[;] you beat Lady Luck[;] of course you'll|have no problem beating me!

Name: Gardener
Last Words 1: Don't you go poking around in my mushrooms!||It's taken me eighty-three years to get them this soggy!
Last Words 2: Yeah[;] get out of here then!||And don't you DARE pick my raspberries[;] they're|for ME and MY FRIENDS and NOT for thoughtless|adventurers!
Last Words Endgame: WATCH OUT FOR THE PEAS!||You'd think the gardening would go better now that we've got a|skylight in[;] but that space marine just keeps coming to gaze up|at the moon and TRAMPLING them again!

Name: Hothead
Last Words 1: I wasn't even trying[;] you know.|Win if you want[;] I don't care.
Last Words 2: I'm actually not bothered. And I didn't want to win anyway.
Last Words 3: Well[;] aren't you a little tryhard.

Name: Robobot
Last Words 1: Pew! Pew-pew-pew pew!||I'll get you next time[;] you big dice!|BZZZT! Pew-pew-pew-pew!
Last Words 2: Pew PEW pew PEW pew PEW!||BZZZZZZZZZT!

Name: Slime
Last Words 1: Slup slup SLORP slurp!||SLORP slurp! SLUP!
Last Words 2: Slurp!||SLUUUUUUUURP!
Last Words 3: Slup slup-slup slup!|Slup-slup slup slurp!||SLORP.
Last Words Endgame: S-lurp lurp! Slup-p-purp!

Name: Frog
Last Words 1: Ugggh! I keep telling them|I need a bigger sword!
Last Words 2: When I have a big sword like I DESERVE then this|won't happen again! YOU JUST WAIT AND SEE.
Last Words Endgame: Ugggh. I'll get you next time!||Also DID YOU SEE MY NEW BIG SWORD!|IT'S SO BIG! I'M SO HAPPY!

Name: Wolf Puppy
Super Equipment: Woof Woof Woof|Wolf Puppy Bite|Wolf Puppy Bite
Last Words 1: Hey! Hey! Hey! If you see my|mum could you say hi to her?||She's like me but she's REALLY BIG|and her teeth are so sharp!
Last Words 2: Hey! Hey! It's you! Can you give me a pat?||I promise I won't bite *all* your hand off!

Name: Rose
Last Words 1: The poets don't write about... dice[;] you know.||Would *you* smell as sweet by any|other name? I rather think not.
Last Words 2: Well[;] as the poet said[;] 'they are not long[;] the days of wine and roses'.|I don't believe he mentioned dice.
Last Words Endgame: Well. Another awful fight. I assume you're cheating.||But I've enrolled in our new training programme to prepare myself for|promotion to a superior Dungeon level[;] so at least I won't have to|put up with this nonsense for much longer.

Name: Dryad
Last Words 1: Oh you think you can beat TREES do you?|You feeling good?||The trees will WAIT and they will|EAT you when you're gone[;] mate.
Last Words 2: You can't hide from trees!||They live for hundreds of years! They feast on the dead!
Last Words 3: You think you're so smart[;] don't you? But|trees are the original vampire[;] mate.||They grow from dust and they FEED on your BLOOD.

Name: Baby Squid
Last Words 1: Aaaa[;] you win[;] that was so clever! It was so|much fun playing with you!||Please visit me again[;] I get so bored|and lonely here.
Last Words Endgame: That was such a good fight!||But not as good as when we all beat Lady Luck[;] that|was SO good! You're so brave and smart!

Name: Sticky Hands
Last Words 1: Beat ya later[;] gladiator!
Last Words 2: Ha ha[;] I'll just wait for you to lose[;]|and then I'll take *all* your gold.

Name: Alchemist
Last Words 1: *sighs* I had a really good potion coming up. What a waste.
Last Words 2: Yet again the fight ends before I get to use my best stuff.|Honestly[;] these Dungeons.
Last Words 3: This potion was going to blow your mind! Literally!||I only had to boil it for thirty more seconds|and it would have been perfect.

Name: Marshmallow
Last Words 1: There's only room for *one* cube monster in|this dungeon[;] and it's mua-ha-harshmallow!
Last Words 2: Mua-ha-ha! You think because of one lucky fight|you can win the whole game? Not a chance!||Mua-ha-ha-harshmallow will get you next time!
Last Words Endgame: Mua-ha-harshmallow isn't happy about this!||Just because you beat Lady Luck once doesn't|mean you can beat us all the time!

Name: Mimic
Script: Before Start Turn: var x = ~~; if(Rules.upgradeenemyequipment) { x = ~+~; } removeequipment(~Mystery Box~ + x); var mimicequipment = loadtext(~diceydungeons/mysterybox~); giveequipment(rand(mimicequipment) + x | true | false);
Script: End Turn: var x = ~~; if(Rules.upgradeenemyequipment) { x = ~+~; } removeequipment(ALL); giveequipment(~Mystery Box~ + x | true | false);
Last Words 1: Hey[;] I've got some super-comfy cushions|here if you want to crawl in for a nap...
Last Words 2: Oh well done! But that fight must have taken it out of you.||Why not climb into this entirely non-suspicious|chest-shaped resting space and take a nap?

Name: Stereohead
Last Words 1: Hey[;] rad fight!||I don't suppose you've got any cassettes with you|from literally any year after 1986?
Last Words 2: Ah what a downer! Where's that mixtape I made to|play when everything goes wrong?||I hope I haven't lost it - that would make me|need it even more...

Name: Wizard
Equipment: Freeze Spell|Flame Spell|Poison Spell|Thunder Spell|Teleport Spell|Hall of Mirrors@enemy
Super Equipment: Freeze Spell|Flame Spell|Poison Spell|Thunder Spell|Teleport Spell|Hall of Mirrors@enemy
Last Words 1: Stupendous! Delightful!||I look forward to fighting you many more|times in our eternity together!
Last Words 2: Splendid! Very convincing! You and your friends|are doing excellently[;] really excellently.
Last Words 3: Good show! You and your chums really are making|stellar progress with this fighting lark!
Last Words Endgame: You continue to impress me with your hard work!||My congratulations on your victories[;] against|me and against Lady Luck.

Name: Sneezy
Super Equipment: Sneeze|Snake Eye Charm|Snake Eye Charm|Poison Needle|Poison Needle
Last Words 1: I wasn't always sneezy[;] you know.|I'm just allergic to dungeons.
Last Words 2: Never mind the dungeon allergy[;]' I said.|'I'll bring antihistamines[;] I'll be fine[;]' I said.||But I ran out after a year. And I've been|here so much longer than that.
Last Words 3: Ah- ah- ahhhh-|...|...||Oh I hate it when the sneeze doesn't even arr- CHOO!
Last Words Endgame: Oh[;] you again. I finally got some more antihistamines now|that we're allowed out of the Dungeons[;] so thanks I guess.||But now it turns out I'm allergic to them as well.|Ahhhh.... CHOO!

Name: Pirate
Last Words 1: Aye I'm far from the sea but a fella like me?||Though the ocean's apart I'm a pirate at heart!
Last Words 2: A pirate cares nothing for 'win' or for 'lose'.|A pirate cares only for fighting and booze!
Last Words 3: See my beard! Ye admire it?|It's 'cos I'm a pirate!
Last Words Endgame: Arrrr[;] good to see ye back! Ye'll not find it easier just because|ye beat Lady Luck once[;] yer know...

Name: Sorceress
Script: Before Combat: var x = ~~; if(Rules.upgradeenemyequipment) { x = ~+~; } var sorceresstype = rand([FIRE| ICE| SHOCK| WEAKEN]); if (sorceresstype == FIRE){ giveequipment([~Cauldron@enemy~ + x| ~Burning Light~  + x| ~Burning Light~ + x | ~Infliction~ + x] | false | false); }else if (sorceresstype == ICE){ giveequipment([~Cauldron@enemy~ + x|  ~Ice Shard~  + x| ~Ice Shard~ + x | ~Infliction~ + x] | false | false); }else if (sorceresstype == SHOCK){ giveequipment([~Cauldron@enemy~ + x|  ~Electric Shock~ + x | ~Electric Shock~ + x| ~Infliction~ + x] | false | false); }else if (sorceresstype == WEAKEN){ giveequipment([~Cauldron@enemy~ + x|  ~Sonic Wave~ + x | ~Sonic Wave~ + x| ~Infliction~ + x] | false | false); }
Last Words 1: okay cool[;] thanks for the fight or whatever|sideeye.gif||ugh[;] this place is the worst
Last Words 2: #thisfightwasdumb #whatever #drama #whocares

Name: Copycat
Script: Before Combat: self.destroyallequipment(); var copiedequipment = []; for(e in target.getcurrentequipment()) { if(Rules.upgradeenemyequipment) { copiedequipment.push(e.name + ~+~); } else { copiedequipment.push(e.name + e.namemodifier); } } giveequipment(copiedequipment| false| false);
Last Words 1: I know you are[;] but what am I?
Last Words 2: I'm rubber[;] you're glue. Bounces off|me and sticks to you!
Last Words 3: Takes one to know one!

Name: Keymaster
Last Words 1: Oh[;] nicely done! Really solid fighting there!||You're going to make such a great minion once you lose!
Last Words 2: Oh[;] another really neat fight!||I wasn't NEARLY this good back when I|was a contestant!||You're going to be a top-ranked minion in no time!

Name: Bully
Last Words 1: I'll be back! And I've got plenty more rocks|where those came from!||Which is here[;] in this underground|dungeon full of rocks!
Last Words 2: You think you're so great! But you know what?||You're not! ROCKS are great and they're gonna get ya!
Last Words Endgame: Rock on! By which I mean I'm going to put a ROCK ON you!||But in[;] like[;] a friendly way because we're friends|now[;] right? RIGHT?

Name: Handyman
Last Words 1: Amazing work! High five!||And again[;] and again - come on[;] keep|going till you've got all the hands!
Last Words 2: Good on ya! Gimme thirty!
Last Words 3: Awesome! Put it there! And here! Get two of your|buddies along and put it everywhere!

Name: Fireman
Last Words 1: Good one! I love an old-fashioned flame war!
Last Words 2: Sick burn!
Last Words 3: Now we're playin' with fire!
Last Words Endgame: Ah that was a good time[;] appreciate it!||And hey[;] not to be all corny but thanks for leadin' that|insurrection before[;] it's really made a difference!

Name: Yeti
Last Words 1: Ugh[;] what are you even doing here?||These dungeons *used* to be cool.
Last Words 2: Ugh[;] I guess they'll let anyone be a contestant these days.
Last Words Endgame: Ugh[;] you only beat Lady Luck because we all helped you[;]|you know. You're not as special as you think.

Name: Cactus
Last Words 1: Oh[;] WHY can't I do better?|What am I doing wrong?||I'm not trained for this[;] I'm just a plant!
Last Words 2: Oh[;] but I tried so hard!||I don't know what else I can do. I used a special gel|on my spikes but they won't grow any sharper.
Last Words 3: Ohhh[;] I lose AGAIN. And nobody wants to give a cactus a|nice comforting hug!
Last Words Endgame: Thank you for visiting[;] it's so nice to see you!||Oh[;] I wish I could beat you just once[;] though.

Name: Vacuum
Last Words 1: Ugh! How embarassing.||If this gets back to the Roombas I'll never hear the end of it!
Last Words 2: Well[;] I'm running on my emergency battery!|What can you expect?
Last Words 3: Honestly[;] everyone knows you shouldn't|use a vacuum to clean up dice.||A dust pan and brush[;] that's where it's at.

Name: Drain Monster
Last Words 1: You can act all high and mighty if you like[;] but I live in|the drains. I hear everything. I know EVERYONE's secrets.
Last Words Endgame: Yeah fine[;] but when you're out in the world and hear a|gurgle in the drains[;] you watch out!||It could be me[;] ready to get you when you LEAST EXPECT IT...

Name: Aurora
Script: Before Combat: if(Rules.upgradeenemyequipment) { var weather = rand([~Hurricane+~|~Thunder Storm+~|~Heatwave+~|~Snowstorm+~]); giveequipment([weather|weather|weather|~Mood Change+~]|true|false); } else { var weather = rand([~Hurricane~|~Thunder Storm~|~Heatwave~|~Snowstorm~]); giveequipment([weather|weather|weather|~Mood Change~]|true|false); }
Last Words 1: You haven't been here long yet[;] have you?||I can still smell the rain on you[;] I can see the last|glimpses of sunlight in your eyes.
Last Words 2: Was it cold when you entered the dungeons? Was there hail?|Are the snowstorms still looking for me?
Last Words Endgame: A fair fight. I'm sorry you didn't get your hearts desire[;] but|at least you got to see the towering clouds again.

Name: Rhino Beetle
Last Words 1: FEE. FI. FO. FICE. I SMELL THE BLOOD|OF A WALKING DICE.
Last Words 2: BE YOU ALIVE OR BE YOU DEAD I'LL ROLL|YOUR BONES TO MAKE MY BREAD.
Last Words Endgame: HELLO[;] FRIEND. YOU WILL PERISH[;] BUT IT IS|GOOD TO SEE YOU AGAIN.

Name: Dire Wolf
Last Words 1: Grrrrr! I'll get you next time[;] you|sneaky little cube.||Also hey look if you see my kid can you make|sure he's brushing his teeth?
Last Words 2: Grrrrr[;] one day I'll beat you!||And hey[;] could you take another message to my kid?||Could you tell him to remember the Gardener is our|colleague and he's NOT allowed to eat him? Thanks!

Name: Kraken
Last Words 1: Grr! This is outrageous!||I was SLEEPETH below the UPPER DEEP|and you WOKE ME UP for THIS?
Last Words 2: I was WINNOWING with GIANT ARMS the SLUMBERING GREEN[;]|and you INTERRUPT me for YET ANOTHER fight?
Last Words 3: And again! Again you barge in while I've|LAIN FOR AGES in UNINVADED SLEEP.||Not so uninvaded now! I hope you're|pleased with yourself!
Last Words Endgame: You WON and yet STILL you must wake me|for your IDEA of a FIGHT?||May HUGE SPONGES of MILLENNIAL GROWTH|AND HEIGHT consume you all!

Name: Crystalina
Last Words 1: CRYSTAL|C R Y S T A L||C    R    Y    S    T    A    L
Last Words 2: T O P A Z     J A S P E R    B L O O D S T O N E||A M E T H Y S T||A   M   E   T   H   Y    S   T
Last Words 3: Q|U||A|R||T|Z
Last Words Endgame: T U R Q U O I S E

Name: Wicker Man
Super Equipment: Burning Light|First Aid Kit|Venus Fly Trap
Last Words 1: Ah don't feel bad[;] mate! I'll just weave|myself back together again...
Last Words 2: Maybe this time I'll weave myself longer legs!||Ah[;] it's great to be made of wicker[;] you should try it!
Last Words 3: Hmm. Being a wicker man isn't working for me.||Maybe I'll try being a wicker golden retriever instead...
Last Words Endgame: Great that you're still around[;] mate!||Every fight's a chance to weave myself up again!|Gonna go for huuuuuge ears this time I reckon.

Name: Snowman
Last Words 1: I love a good snowball fight[;] and|that really was pretty good.||Wanna stick around and make snow angels?
Last Words 2: You know[;] my friends call me Frosty. I don't think|you're a friend yet... but maybe you could be?
Last Words 3: They say there's no business like snow business.
Last Words Endgame: It's great to see you again! Hey[;] has anyone shown|you the new staff room?

Name: Loud Bird
Last Words 1: Caw! Ca-caaaaw!||...Caw!
Last Words 2: Caw.||CAW.
Last Words 3: CAW. CAW. CAW.||Caw?
Last Words Endgame: CAAAAAW caw.||CAW!

Name: Rotten Apple
Last Words 1: Hey[;] hey[;] why is a dice like an apple?||THEY BOTH HAVE PIPS DO YOU SEE
Last Words 2: Hey[;] why is a dice like an apple?||Because they both yearn to one day escape the Dicey Dungeons!
Last Words 3: Hey[;] why is a dice like an apple?||We both contain zero cholesterol.||Not everything is a joke[;] you know. Sometimes|it's good to learn a fact!
Last Words Endgame: Hey[;] hey[;] why is a dice like an apple?||Because they're both vicious fighters that did equally well in|that fight just then[;] I think absoutely let's call that a draw.

Name: Wisp
Last Words 1: Daaaa! Daaa! Da-doo! Bounce bounce!||I love it when you contestants win[;]|your victory song is so much fun!
Last Words Endgame: BOUNCE BOUNCE BOUNCE!||Yippeeee! You can do it!

Name: Cowboy
Last Words 1: Good fightin'[;] high roller! I'll cook your goose next|time[;] don't you worry.
Last Words 2: Well[;] put it there[;] one-slinger!||You did it[;] and you lived to fight another day!||And when that day comes you'll lose for sure[;]|so don't you worry about ol' Cowboy.
Last Words Endgame: Welcome back[;] squartner! Good fighting[;] but I reckon I can|take you next time[;] you just wait and see.

Name: Rat King
Last Words 1: Take[;] then[;] thy victory!||Do with it what thou wilt in these underground realms[;]|for never wilt thou return to the surface!
Last Words 2: In truth[;] it would be undignified for a king to|fight as well as a simple adventurer.||Have thy moment of victory[;] thou wilt not have my crown!
Last Words 3: Ah[;] mayhap I have lost[;] yet am I not still a king?||And in truth[;] thou hast won[;] yet art|thou not still a weird ugly dice?
Last Words Endgame: Thy victory is fleeting[;] and my majesty is eternal!|Thou shalt cower in terror yet!

Name: Warlock
Last Words 1: ...Eheu fugaces labuntur anni.
Last Words 2: ...Marcet sine adversario virtus.
Last Words 3: *long sigh* Alea jacta est.
Last Words Endgame: ...Faber est suae quisque fortunae.

Name: Banshee
Last Words 1: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
Last Words 2: AAAAAAAA||AAAAAAAAAA
Last Words 3: AAAAA||AAAAAA|AAAAAA||AAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
Last Words Endgame: AAAAAA||AAAAAAAAAA|AAAAA|AAA|AA|A

Name: Paper Knight
Last Words 1: It's not fair! It's not fair! I'm telling Lady Luck!
Last Words 2: Aaaaaaa[;] you cheated[;] I'm telling on you!||You're gonna be in so much trouble!
Last Words Endgame: I told Lady Luck you were still fighting and she said you were|going to get sent to detention! So there!

Name: Skeleton
Last Words 1: Inside every adventurer is a skeleton|just waiting to get out.
Last Words 2: Your hapless flesh will fail you one day!||You can't rely on anything except bones!
Last Words Endgame: I guess now that you've won we'll never find out|what a dice's skeleton looks like.

Name: Singer
Last Words 1: Ugh[;] that sucks.||Well[;] adversity fuels art. I'll turn this into a song!
Last Words 2: Ugh[;] I'll have to add this as an extra verse to the|song I wrote last time.
Last Words Endgame: Hey[;] don't run off[;] take a flyer for my show[;] I'm|playing an open mic night next Tuesday...

Name: Gargoyle
Last Words 1: (hee heee hee[;] the rocks will crush you and|you will perish here alone)
Last Words 2: (pleased with yourself?)||(hee hee[;] you may win one fight[;] but the stones of the|dungeons will weigh heavy on your soul for ever)
Last Words 3: (heeee[;] you think you're going to win[;] don't you? But|the granite around you yearns to be your grave.)
Last Words Endgame: (heeehee[;] you think because you won the game[;] you're free.)||(But you're never free of the weight of the earth and|the heft of the stones.)

Name: Bounty Hunter
Last Words 1: A crushing defeat - and yet still a thousand times more enjoyable|than anything which happened on X-av-5guu!||Your planet is remarkable!
Last Words 2: Oh well! I'm very used to losing fights. On my home planet|of X-av-5guu I was bullied cruelly for wearing a monocle.||Here on earth[;] everyone is so surprised to|see an alien that they don't even notice.
Last Words 3: Another loss! I mourn it! If I won[;] Lady Luck was going to|let me taste ice cream for the very first time.||It is sweet[;] yet it is cold! Ridiculous! How can that be?
Last Words Endgame: A terrible defeat! And yet I begrudge you nothing[;] because|the Earth food available in our new staff room is a|perpetual wonder to me!||I delight in your very presence!

Name: Audrey
Last Words 2: Ugh! Well[;] thanks for inspiring me to work harder.||I'll get you next time!
Last Words (if they win): Bad luck there! Keep working hard! You'll make it one day!

Name: Scathach
Equipment: The Curse|The Wind|The Shadow|The Cold|The Ashes|The Storm
Super Equipment: The Curse|The Wind|The Shadow|The Cold|The Ashes|The Storm
Last Words 2: So falls the injured hawk to the carrion vulture.||...||Way out's over there[;] no need to hang around|getting in the way all afternoon.
Last Words (if they win): So the trees reach back to the sun[;] the tide comes in again[;]|and all is right with the world.||Buzz off then - game's over[;] loser.
